page.title: 10A LOCAL BUSINESS
page.content: THE CEIRIOG TRADING COMPANY IS A BUILDERS MERCHANTS. IT HAS BEEN GOING FOR 4 YEARS. IT SELLS THINGS LIKE BRICKS, BREEZEBLOCKS, CEMENT, TILES, WOOD, GUTTERING, PLASTIC ROOFING, DRAINAGE PIPES, WINDOW FRAMES, DOORS, NAILS AND SCREWS. BUILDERS COME FROM ALL OVER OUR AREA AND OUTSIDE OF OUR AREA TO BUY THINGS. CEIRIOG TRADING HAVE 3 LORRIES WHICH CAN DELIVER THINGS, AND AS LONG AS ITS NOT TOO FAR AWAY, THEY DONT CHARGE ANYTHING. IN PART OF THEIR YARD THERE IS A BIG PILE OF GRIT THAT THE COUNCIL LORRIES PUT ON THE ROAD IN THE WINTER SO THAT THE VEHICLES DONT SLIP ON THE ICE AND SNOW.
